description:
Whats it about?

I will show you how to install Wamp a local hosting solutions for running PHP scripts and SQL databases, in these examples we will install both Joomla and Wordpress.
We will also tackle some of the install problems your likely to encounter while trying to install Wamp.
Further to this I will show you how to get CMS systems to run when encountering problems on install.

Who's it for?
This course is suitable for all user levels

Key course features

  • Download service packs if you need them
  • Download Wamp
  • Install Service packs and Wamp
  • Set up databases from Wamp and using PHPAdmin
  • Setup and install both Wordpress and Joomla
  • Document sheets for trouble shooting

At the end of this course you will be familar with Wamp and be able to set up your own system as easy as 1, 2, 3!
title: Website Building Basics with Wamp, WordPress and Joomla
